alert: 🚨 CRITICAL: Fence Breach at Student Dormitory! Unauthorized person detected climbing fence.
recommended_action: Dispatch security units immediately to Gate3 at the Student Dormitory. Apprehend the unauthorized individual. Advise units that two authorized students (John_Doe, Sarah_Wilson) are also on scene.
explanation: A confirmed unauthorized individual has actively breached a secure perimeter at a highly sensitive location (Student Dormitory). The act of climbing the fence constitutes a gate_climbing_intrusion, which requires an immediate response to ensure student safety and secure the premises.
